title: ECB Locked on Hold as Calls for Hikes This Year Fade, Poll Shows
description: The European Central Bank is expected to keep interest rates unchanged at least through the end of next year, with calls for a hike in 2026 receding.
content: The European Central Bank is expected to keep interest rates unchanged at least through the end of next year, with calls for a hike in 2026 receding.
